title: Privilege, Taxes, The Bundys and the Holiday Season. The Warren Markowitz Show, Politically Incorrect, 12/22/2017
description: The Warren Markowitz Show, It's My World You Just Live In It. A soap box for Independent Ideas, current events and politics of the day. Privilege, Taxes, The Bundys and the Holiday Season, our Chinese Take-Out Menu for the day, but its the top issues for those paying attention. Join me as I wander through the matters that seem to matter the most. Trigger Warnings; I'm not intending to be Politically Correct. Podcast: Galtspeaks.com Contact: Radio@galtspeaks.com Follow us on twitter.com/radiomarkowitz & Facebook.com/radiomarkowitz Spreaker-www.spreaker.com/show/the-warren-markowitz-show
dc:creator: Warren Markowitz
